title: So, Lee Sin's Lore....
body:
Is totally messed up now. If the IOW and summoners are gone from the lore, what is Lee's lore? He wanted to be a summoner,messed things up, and became a champion but...now what? 


{{item:3070}} {{champion:64}} {{item:3070}} Why Rito?

What does everyone else think?

replies.body: I saw a comment that that suggested that if summoners weren't canon, just change Lee Sin from "summoner" to "powerful mage" which I'll admit that I cannot say for certain how well that would work as I haven't read his lore, but it's at least an idea as to how to try and fix it slightly.
That would work, but he became a champion to atone for his sins, so they would need to change that too...
H became a monk to atone for his sins. He became a champion because he was hella good at being a monk.
